headline: Zacks Industry Outlook Highlights Home Depot, Lowe's, Williams-Sonoma and The Lovesac
summary: Home Depot, Lowe's, Williams-Sonoma and Lovesac ride housing recovery, digital tools and product innovation in a shifting retail market.

headline: A Look Back at Home Furnishing and Improvement Retail Stocks’ Q1 Earnings: Lowe's (NYSE:LOW) Vs The Rest Of The Pack
summary: As the Q1 earnings season comes to a close, it’s time to take stock of this quarter’s best and worst performers in the home furnishing and improvement retail industry, including Lowe's (NYSE:LOW) and its peers.
